mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS memberIdx, username AS userId, password AS userPwd, nickname AS userName, email, created_at AS register_date FROM users WHERE username = #{userId} AND password = #{userPwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( user_id, username, password, email, nickname, status, created_at ) VALUES ( users_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{email}, #{userName}, 'ACTIVE', SYSDATE )
